segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but feel a little scared for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and he’s stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and she’s still drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he doesn’t even see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and send him crashing to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s obliviousness is making this whole scene even more tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
